1.name: Name of my dog
1.question: Guess what was my dog name.
1.explanation: I had a dog named Utah, she was a german shepherd.

3.name: Fish fights
3.question: In which country did people first start keeping fighting fish (Betta splendens)?
3.explanation: Fighting fish, or bettas, were first collected and bred for fighting in Thailand (formerly Siam), where villagers pitted males against each other in contests.
